Name: Vermillion Watch: Moorgate Accord Collector's Edition
About the game: Eipix Entertainment presents an exciting new series in Vermillion Watch: Moorgate Accord! What starts as an ordinary meeting with your uncle and his friend quickly takes a dark turn when a massive creature of unknown origin attacks! Delve into your family history to uncover a secret accord between the forces of good and evil. Can you stop the monster terrorizing the streets of London before it’s too late, or will you be its next victim? Find out in this gripping hidden-object puzzle adventure! • Stop Irene Adler and her thugs in the bonus chapter! • Find hidden souvenirs to unlock the bonus souvenir room. • Tons of collectibles, including morphing objects and hidden symbols! • Trading Cards, Badges, Backgrounds and emoji available. • Remember your journey with posters, screensavers, soundtrack, and more!
